sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import s from "./Users.module.css"; const Users = (props) => { props.setUsers( [{id:1,photoUrl:link, name: "Dmitriy", status:"Hello world", location:{city:"Minsk", country:"Belarus"}, followed:true}, {id:2,photoUrl:link, name: "Ivan", status:"I am a boss", location:{city:"Moscow", country:"Russia"}, followed:false}, {id:3,photoUrl:link, name: "Tanya", status:"ha ha ha", location:{city:"Kiev", country:"Ucraine"}, followed:true},] ) return
{ props.users.map(u =>
{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.status}
{u.location.city}
{u.location.country}
) }
} export default Users;
